TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DefaultTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TraceListener

summary.span: 提供用于跟踪的默认输出方法和行为。

span.span: Provides the default output methods and behavior for tracing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的实例会自动添加到和集合。An instance of this class is automatically added to the and collections. 显式添加第二个原因复制调试器输出窗口中的消息和重复的消息框断言。Explicitly adding a second causes duplicate messages in the debugger output window and duplicate message boxes for asserts. 默认情况下，和方法发出到 Win32 消息`OutputDebugString`函数并对其方法。By default, the and methods emit the message to the Win32 `OutputDebugString` function and to the method. 璝惠`OutputDebugString`函数中，请参阅平台 SDK 或 MSDN。For information about the `OutputDebugString` function, see the Platform SDK or MSDN. 方法，默认情况下，会显示一个消息框时在用户界面模式中运行应用程序; 它也发出消息使用。The method, by default, displays a message box when the application is running in a user interface mode; it also emits the message using . > [!NOTE] > 显示的消息框和方法调用取决于是否存在的。The display of the message box for and method calls depends on the presence of the . 如果不在集合，消息框不会显示。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以删除[\<清除 > 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，也可由[\<删除 > 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，或通过调用方法属性 (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`)。The can be removed by the [\ element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), by the [\ element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 你必须启用跟踪或调试才能使用跟踪侦听器。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a trace listener. 下面的语法是特定的编译器。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果你使用除 C# 或 Visual Basic 编译器，请参阅你的编译器的文档。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要启用调试 C# 中，添加`/d:DEBUG`到编译器命令行编译代码，或添加时的标志`#define DEBUG`到你的文件的顶部。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:DEBUG=True`到编译器命令行的标志。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要启用 C# 中的跟踪，将添加`/d:TRACE`到编译器命令行编译代码，或添加时的标志`#define TRACE`到你的文件的顶部。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:TRACE=True`到编译器命令行的标志。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. 若要添加跟踪侦听器，请编辑配置文件对应于你的应用程序的名称。To add a trace listener, edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加侦听器、 将其类型设置和其参数，删除的侦听器，或清除以前由应用程序设置的所有侦听器。Within this file, you can add a listener, set its type and set its parameters, remove a listener, or clear all the listeners previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似于下面的示例：The configuration file should be formatted similar to the following example: ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例计算二项式系数，概率和统计信息中使用的值。The following code example calculates binomial coefficients, which are values used in probability and statistics. 此示例使用跟踪结果以及记录错误。This example uses a to trace results and log errors. 它创建一个新，将其添加到集合，并设置到命令行自变量中指定的日志文件的属性。It creates a new , adds it to the collection, and sets the property to the log file specified in the command-line arguments. 如果处理的输入的参数时检测到错误或如果`CalcBinomial`函数引发异常，方法记录并显示一条错误消息。If an error is detected while processing the input parameter, or if the `CalcBinomial` function throws an exception, the method logs and displays an error message. 如果属性是`false`，错误消息也会写入到控制台。If the property is `false`, the error message is also written to the console. 已成功，计算结果时和方法会将结果写入日志文件。When the result is calculated successfully, the and methods write the results to the log file. ， ，和方法导致跟踪信息，从而只写入。The , , and methods cause trace information to be written only to the . 若要将跟踪信息写入到中的所有侦听器集合，使用， ，和方法类。To write trace information to all listeners in the collection, use the , , and methods of the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener/CS/binomial.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener/VB/binomial.vb#11)]

summary.span: 为总是失败的断言发出或显示消息和堆栈跟踪。

span.span: Emits or displays a message and a stack trace for an assertion that always fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此方法可发送`message`参数和堆栈跟踪到一个消息框 （如果在用户界面模式下运行应用程序） 和实例。By default, this method sends the `message` parameter and a stack trace to a message box (when the application runs in user-interface mode) and to the instance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将错误消息写入使用方法。The following code example writes an error message to a using the method. 方法未提供用户界面时，还将消息写入到控制台。The method also writes the message to the console if a user interface is not available. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此方法可发送`message`参数，`detailMessage`参数，并且堆栈跟踪到一个消息框 （如果在用户界面模式下运行应用程序） 和实例。By default, this method sends the `message` parameter, the `detailMessage` parameter, and a stack trace to a message box (when the application runs in user-interface mode) and to the instance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用调用的函数，方法来记录详细的错误消息，如果该函数将引发异常。The following code example calls a function that calls the method to log a detailed error message if the function throws an exception. 该方法将消息写入控制台，如果用户界面不可用。The method writes the message to the console if a user interface is not available. summary.span: 将输出写入 函数和 方法，后接回车符和换行符 (\r\n)。

span.span: Writes the output to the function and to the method, followed by a carriage return and line feed (\r\n).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认行结束符是回车符后接一个换行符 (\r\n)。The default line terminator is a carriage return followed by a line feed (\r\n). 有关 Win32`OutputDebugString`调试函数，请参阅平台 SDK 或 MSDN。For information about the Win32 `OutputDebugString` debugging function, see the Platform SDK or MSDN. 此方法会设置属性`true`。This method sets the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置函数的结果的格式并使用方法写入到消息的最后一个部分。The following code example formats the results of a function and uses the method to write the last part of the message to a . [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener.WriteLine#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener.WriteLine/CS/defaulttracelistener.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener.WriteLine#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener.WriteLine/VB/defaulttracelistener.vb#4)]
